summary:
The world of possibilities evangelist
My blood group is B+, being positive is in my vain you can say. I truly believe that if you really want something to be achieved you can ! Over the last 30 years i witnessed many examples this karma to be working. I share my experience in anyway and with anyone. This positive and hungry mentality of learning & experiencing new ways forward to get the job done inspires me and motivates others. Enabling me to realize personal and team goals.

Over 25 years of sales experience 
In these 25 years i gained results in team leadership, team development and business development. My focus always is on the “what’s in it for the customer” question. The simple “why"​ mentality leads to large opportunities and has helped to become a reliable and trusted person to work with. I strive to create the right buying atmosphere to lead customers in making their business outcome decisions.

Skilled sales professional
I am a senior-level matter of fact sales professional with extensive experience in highly competitive markets. Experienced in multiple aspects of the sales process, from new revenue growth,  multi level selling and deal maker. With a track record in finance, manufacturing, retail and government. Experienced in getting results working for US, UK, Dutch and Swedish based organisations. Winner of Euro cloud award best business case  2014. Co-writer of “Efficient Automatiseren, praktijkvisies op cloud computing"​.

Interests
My interest are in strategic initiatives related to digital transformation and proactive innovation (meaning a “Fail fast, to succeed faster,” mentality). Examples are user/customer experience, mobile workforce, application transformation, cloud computing, virtualization solutions. And since disruptive technologies as IOT, Smart machines and AI, begins to find its way in the boardroom it really makes me think outside in on what we can add to the community as a whole and make this world a little better every day.
